entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as speaking in a muffled voice and sobbing. He is packing items for the journey.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is being sent away, and Hagrid is saying goodbye to him. The crate containing Norbert makes ripping noises as they move it.

entities.name: teddy bear
entities.description: Hagrid has packed the teddy bear in case Harry gets lonely during the journey.

entities.name: invisiblity cloak
entities.description: Harry and Hermione use the Invisibility Cloak to cover the crate containing Norbert.

entities.name: mummy
entities.description: Hagrid mentions that Mummy will never forget Norbert, implying that Mummy is someone who cares for Norbert.

relationships.description: Hagrid is sending away Norbert, as indicated by his goodbye and the crate containing Norbert.
Harry uses the Invisibility Cloak to cover the crate containing Norbert.
Hermione also uses the Invisibility Cloak to cover the crate containing Norbert.
